name: Create ClickUp tasks for new FormCrafts form responses
description:
Every time a new form is submitted in FormCrafts, a task will be created in ClickUp using provided information.

The template expects your form to have at least the following fields:
1. First Name
2. Last Name
3. Email
4. How Can We Help?

The template uses this [sample form](https://formcrafts.com/a/mrvcsfa).
